title: Trials Legends
description:
Trials Legends
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Revisit the history of Trials in Trials Legends, a new, free PC game that recaptures the classic gameplay of the original web and PC-based Trials experience from 2000 to 2005.

Trials Legends reprises 33 classic tracks from the early days of years 2000Ã¢â‚¬â€œ2005 of Trials, and includes six bike models, 15 ranks to achieve, local scoreboards, a track creator, and a short history of RedLynx Trials games. The tracks are based on courses from Trials Basic, Trials Pro, Trials Construction Yard, and Trials Mountain Heights Ã¢â‚¬â€œ games originally released between 2000 and 2005 as free-to-play online Java games and small PC games.


Features:
33 Classic Tracks
6 Bike Models
Local Scoreboards
Track Creator
History of the Trials series


Size: 104MB
Compatibility: PC
